faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the fake DOS prank simulator

questions.question: Is this DOS prank safe to use?
questions.answer: Absolutely safe! This is just a web simulation that mimics DOS formatting. It doesn't actually format or damage any files on your computer.

questions.question: Will this actually delete my files?
questions.answer: No! This is purely visual simulation. No files are deleted, no formatting occurs. It's completely harmless and safe.

questions.question: How do I exit the prank?
questions.answer: Press ESC key or F11 to exit fullscreen mode. The prank will also automatically reveal itself after completion.

questions.question: Can I use this on mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes! The DOS prank works on all devices including smartphones and tablets with fullscreen support.

questions.question: Is this suitable for office pranks?
questions.answer: While harmless, please use responsibly and consider your workplace environment before pranking colleagues.
